channel.title: Dividend Declaration on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Dividend Declaration on FinanClub

item.title: KGC
item.description: score:1000 Chances: Kinross Gold’s positive Q2 2023 earnings call transcript. Renewal of Kinross Gold’s normal course issuer bid (NCIB) program. Earnings and revenue surprises for Kinross Gold in the second quarter of 2023. Declaration of dividend by Kinross Gold for Q2 2023. Expectations of higher earnings for Kinross Gold due to improved production and higher gold prices.

item.title: KVUE
item.description: score:1116 Chances: Kenvue Inc., the consumer brand spinoff of Johnson & Johnson (J&J), reported strong quarterly earnings and beat analyst estimates on both the top and bottom lines, indicating a positive start for the newly public company. Kenvue’s forecast for full-year profit above Wall Street estimates, driven by resilient demand for skincare and self-care products, such as Neutrogena and Tylenol, signals confidence in its business outlook.
